ARABIC: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'I am better than him. You created me from fire but You created him from clay.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "I am better than he. You created me from fire, and him from clay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He replied: “I am nobler than he. You created me from fire and created him from clay.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "I am better than him. You have created me from fire and him out of clay".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Iblis, “I am better than him; You made me from fire, and You have created him from clay!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Iblis] said: "I am better than he. You created me from fire, and You created him from clay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: I am better than he; Thou hast created me of fire, and him Thou didst create of dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'I am better than he; Thou createdst me of fire, and him Thou createdst of clay.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: I am better than him. Thou createdst me of fire, whilst him Thou didst create of clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Satan replied, "I am better than him. You created me from fire, but You created him from clay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: I am better than he: me Thou hast created of fire, and him Thou hast created of clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘I am better than him,’ he said. ‘You created me from fire and You created him from clay.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Iblis) said: "I am better than he: thou createdst me from fire, and him thou createdst from clay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Iblis (Satan)] said: "I am better than he, You created me from fire, and You created him from clay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (satan) replied: 'I am better than he. You created me from fire, and You created him from clay'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “I am better than he; You created me from fire, and You created him from clay.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:76] He said, ‘I am better than him. You created me from fire and You created him from clay’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: I am better than him. Thou createdst me of fire, whilst him Thou didst create of clay) and the Fire consumes clay; this is why I did not prostrate before him.
